name: desktop-icons
objective: LibreOffice Applications Icons in gnome launcher office section
description: check if the LibreOffice Applications Icons are correctly positioned in gnome launcher office section

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top bar

steps.expected: "LibreOffice", "Writer", "Calc" and "Impress" icons are visible in this section

author: elebideau

name: create-document-writer
description: Create a new LibreOffice Writer document from file manager

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top bar
In the file manager, right-click on an empty space and select "new LibreOffice Writer document" in the drop-down menu

author: elebideau

name: create-document-calc
description: Create a new LibreOffice Calc document from file manager

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top bar
In the file manager, right-click on an empty space and select "new LibreOffice Calc document" in the drop-down menu

author: elebideau

name: create-document-impress
description: Create a new LibreOffice Impress document from file manager

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top bar
In the file manager, right-click on an empty space and select "new LibreOffice Impress document" in the drop-down menu

author: elebideau

name: file-associations-writer
objective: LibreOffice Writer actions available when clicking on  documents
description: check if there is some LibreOffice Writer actions available when clicking on  documents
pre_condition: have a few documents with different formats in the "Home" folder : .odt - .doc - .docx - .rtf - .txt

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top bar
In the file manager, right-click on the .odt, the .doc file, the .docx file, the .rtf file and the .txt file
steps.expected: "Open with LibreOffice Writer" is visible in the drop-down menu for each file

author: elebideau

name: file-associations-calc
objective: LibreOffice Calc actions available when clicking on  documents
description: check if there is some LibreOffice Calc actions available when clicking on  documents
pre_condition: have a few documents with different formats in the "Home" folder : .ods - .xls - .xlsx - .csv

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top bar
In the file manager, right-click on the .ods, the .xls file, the .xlsx file, the .csv file
steps.expected: "Open with LibreOffice Calc" is visible in the drop-down menu for each file

author: elebideau

name: file-associations-impress
objective: LibreOffice Impress actions available when clicking on  documents
description: check if there is some LibreOffice Impress actions available when clicking on  documents
pre_condition: have a few documents with different formats in the "Home" folder : .odp - .ppt - .pptx

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top bar
In the file manager, right-click on the .odp, the .ppt file, the .pptx file
steps.expected: "Open with LibreOffice Impress" is visible in the drop-down menu for each file

author: elebideau

name: hyperlink-writer
description: create an hyperlink and check if the web browser starts when clicking on link in Writer

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top bar
In the Writer window opened, click on "Insert" in the top menu
Click on "hyperlink" in the drop-down menu
In the new window, type "http://www.google.fr" in the "target" field

steps.expected: A link is visible on the Writer page

steps.description: On the Writer page, press "Ctrl" and click on the hyperlink newly created

author: elebideau

name: hyperlink-calc
description: create an hyperlink and check if the web browser starts when clicking on link in Calc

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top bar
In the Calc window opened, click on "Insert" in the top menu
Click on "hyperlink" in the drop-down menu
In the new window, type "http://www.google.fr" in the "target" field

steps.expected: A link is visible on the Calc page

steps.description: On the Calc page, click on the hyperlink newly created

author: elebideau

name: hyperlink-impress
description: create an hyperlink and check if the web browser starts when clicking on link in Impress

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top bar
In the Impress window opened, click on "Insert" in the top menu
Click on "hyperlink" in the drop-down menu
In the new window, type "http://www.google.fr" in the "target" field

steps.expected: A link is visible on the Impress page

steps.description: On the Impress page, click on the hyperlink newly created

author: elebideau

name: themes-startcenter
description: check if Tizen Theme is correctly applied to LibreOffice StartCenter

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top bar

steps.expected: LibreOffice StartCenter starts and Tizen Theme is applied to it

author: elebideau

name: themes-writer
description: check if Tizen Theme is correctly applied to LibreOffice Writer

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top bar

steps.expected: Writer starts and Tizen Theme is applied to it

author: elebideau

name: themes-calc
description: check if Tizen Theme is correctly applied to LibreOffice Calc

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top bar

steps.expected: Calc starts and Tizen Theme is applied to it

author: elebideau

name: themes-impress
description: check if Tizen Theme is correctly applied to LibreOffice Impress

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top bar

steps.expected: Impress starts and Tizen Theme is applied to it

author: elebideau

name: email-writer
objective: mail a document from LibreOffice Writer
description: use the "mail a document" option in LibreOffice Writer and check if the mail application starts correctly

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top bar
Click on "File" in the top-left bar
Click on "Document as E-mail" in the drop-right menu
steps.expected: A new-mail-window of your mail application opens

author: elebideau

name: email-calc
objective: mail a document from LibreOffice Calc
description: use the "mail a document" option in LibreOffice Calc and check if the mail application starts correctly

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top bar
Click on "File" in the top-left bar
Click on "Document as E-mail" in the drop-right menu
steps.expected: A new-mail-window of your mail application opens

author: elebideau

name: email-impress
objective: mail a document from LibreOffice Impress
description: use the "mail a document" option in LibreOffice Impress and check if the mail application starts correctly

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top bar
Click on "File" in the top-left bar
Click on "Document as E-mail" in the drop-right menu
steps.expected: A new-mail-window of your mail application opens

author: elebideau
